bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Interest rate re Taxation (Rural Area) Act
bcl:section.bcl:text: The rate of interest under section 11 (3) of the Taxation (Rural Area) Act is

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: the period July 1, 1983 until August 31, 1983, 1 1/2% above the prime lending rate of the principal banker to the Province on June 15, 1983, and

during each successive period beginning on September 1, January 1 and May 1 in every year, 1 1/2% above the prime lending rate of the principal banker to the Province on the 15th day of the month immediately preceding that 4 month period, and

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: during each successive period beginning on January 1, May 1 and September 1 in every year, commencing October 1, 1992, 3% above the prime lending rate of the principal banker to the Province on the 15th day of the month immediately preceding that period.

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 224/2023, effective January 1, 2023 [retro from October 23, 2023].

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Interest rate re Motor Fuel Tax Act
bcl:section.bcl:text: The rate of interest under section 48 of the Motor Fuel Tax Act shall be

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: for tax due on purchases or use of fuel by licensed carriers, as that term is defined in that Act, at a rate equal to the Canadian Federal Treasury Bill rate plus 2% and adjusted every calendar quarter, and
for all other amounts due under that Act, at the rate established under section 1 of this regulation.
